price: ¿Cuántos Profetas he enviado a los pueblos de la antigüedad?
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
